mutants.code:
def max_beauty_of_photos(n, heights, beauties):
    d = 1
    v = [0] * (n + 1)
    p = [-9 ** 42] + [0] * n
    s = []
    heights = [0] + heights
    beauties = [0] + beauties
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        while s and heights[s[-1]] > heights[i]:
            d = max(d, v[len(s)])
            s.pop()
        s.append(i)
        v[len(s)] = d
        d = p[len(s)] = max(p[len(s) - 1], d + beauties[i])
    return d

def max_beauty_of_photos(n, heights, beauties):
    d = 0

    p = [-9 ** 42] + [0] * n
